title: Pixel 4a call/.../setting/add setting/caller id greyed anybody??
content:
Pixel 4a call/.../setting/add setting/caller id greyed. Anybody has this issue?

Google support could not fix it. Phone carrier can't either....

Sometimes it would work but 99% of the time it stays greyed out. If I swap hide/not id. It goes greyed again

Tried 
-updating call app
-factory reset
-even got a new phone (exchange)
-carrier said the feature is turned one
-tried a another sim

My prev pixel 2 has no such issue.
